ui.gui
Class Animator

java.lang.Object
  ui.gui.Animator

 class Animator
extends java.lang.Object

Animation engine.

Nested Class Summary
private  class Animator.AComponent
          Element added to root layered pane for painting animations.
private  class Animator.ALabel
          Animation of labeled shape bounds, color and label color changes.
private static interface Animator.APainter
          A class that can paint.
private  class Animator.Arc
          Animate drawing an arc.
private static class Animator.ArcGradient
          Arc2D that grows from nothing to specitifed extent.
private  class Animator.Arrow
          Animate drawing an arrow.
private  class Animator.AShape
          Animation of shape bounds and color changes.
private  class Animator.Block
          A rectangle, color, label, labelColor and possible visible component, grouped for convenience.
private  class Animator.BlockList
          Synchronized, searchable list of Blocks.
private  class Animator.Clear
          A clip to clear a block.
private  class Animator.ClearWorker
          Perform clear public method using SceneWorker.
private  class Animator.Clip
          Base class of all animation clips.
private static class Animator.ColorGradient
          Progressive gradient between two colors through a set of steps.
private  class Animator.Composite
          Collection of clips.
private  class Animator.ControlFlowScene
          Animate control flow from one PC to another.
private  class Animator.DataFlowScene
          Animate the flow of data between target location and cpu location.
private  class Animator.DrawingClip
          Extend AShape to include a clear clip and to encapsulate the associated AComponent.
private  class Animator.FadeIn
          Animate the fading in of a block.
private  class Animator.FadeOut
          Animate the fading out of a block.
private  class Animator.Line
          Animate drawing a line.
private  class Animator.Overlay
          Collection of clips rendered in parallel.
private static class Animator.PolygonGradient
          Polygon that changes from one bounds to another.
private static class Animator.RectangleGradient
          Rectangle2D changes from one bounds to another.
private  class Animator.RenderWorker
          Perform render public method using SceneWorker.
private static class Animator.RoundRectangleGradient
          RoundRectangle2D changes from one bounds to another.
private static interface Animator.Scene
          Top-level animation scene interface.
private  class Animator.SceneWorker
          Runable version of a scene.
private  class Animator.Sequence
          Collection of clips rendered in sequence.
private static interface Animator.ShapeGradient
          Progressive shape through a set of steps.
private static class Animator.Stage
          Animation stage timing.
private  class Animator.StaggeredPath
          Animate drawing a line that connects two vertically aligned points that iscomprised of 3 sections: horizontal to the left a stagger distance, vertical, then horizontal to the right the stagger distance.
private static class Animator.StringGradient
          Progressive string between two values through a set of steps.

private  class Animator.Transmute

convertPoint

private java.awt.Point convertPoint(java.awt.Component source,
                                    java.awt.Point point)
Conver point to animation coordinates.

render

void render(Animator.Target target,
            Animator.Type type,
            View view,
            int labelCol,
            int row,
            int col,
            int count)
Render a scene.

Parameters:
target - rendering target type.
type - rendering type.
view - view compoment of rendering target.
labelCol - column of view's dataModel that stores target label.
row - target row in view's dataModel.
col - target col in view's dataModel.
count - number of consecutive columns, starting at col, inclued in the target.

clear

void clear()
Clear animation state.

setDuration

void setDuration(int aDuration)
Set the estimated duration of animation. This will be the time taken by each scene of the animation and so animations with more scenes taken longer than those with fewer.

Parameters:
aDuration - new duration in milliseconds.

getDuration

int getDuration()
Get current animation duration.

setEnabled

void setEnabled(boolean anIsEnabled)
Set animation to be enabled or disabled. Disabling also stops the current animation immediately.

isEnabled

boolean isEnabled()
Determine whether animation is currently enabled.

stop

void stop()
Stop active animation immediately. Implementation Note: This call can be concurrent with the renderer and so all data stuctures touched by stop and rendering must be properly synchronized.

pause

void pause()
Pause active animation. Implementation Note: Concurrent with rendering.

resume

void resume()
Resume pased animation. Impementation Note: Concurrent with rendering.

isPaused

boolean isPaused()
Determined whether animation is currently paused.
